name: TEAM RELMS BETA DEMO V2
description:
A 3D/360 Platform with VR capability that promises to bring you more than just gaming. Punk is never dead when rebel visionaries can bring you an alternative online future teamrelms.online

PC or MAC**

PLAY IN "GOOD", "BEAUTIFUL" AND "FANTASTIC" MODE FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

CONTROLS:

WALK: (ARROW KEYS) + MOUSE(CAMERA PANNING)

RUN: HOLD  Left Shift

JUMP: Space Bar

(NEW)***ACTIVATE FLY MODE:  F 

CROUCH:  C

V 2 CURRENT UPDATE HAS 8 LEVELS AND 2 HIDDEN RELMS

**MAC USERS MUST HOLD DOWN "CTRL" KEY AND CHOOSE "OPEN" WHEN LAUNCHING APP IF MESSAGE APPEARS PROHIBITING THE LAUNCHING OF THE APP AS AN UNIDENTIFIED DEVELOPER 

***FLY MODE IS AVAILABLE ONLY ON CERTAIN LEVELS NOT ALL
